product.title: Goofy and the Magic Fish | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Goofy and the Magic Fish

Goofy delights young readers in this magical tale that brings a humorous spin to the classic story of Aladdin and his three wishes. On his latest fishing expedition, Goofy catches a magic fish who agrees to grant him three wishes after he’s returned safely to the ocean.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to list what three things she would wish for if she were to catch a magic fish. Next, encourage her to list three wishes for each member of the family, and to share her motivation for each wish.
